mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shuttle_common.sc_security_staff(username,password,status,`name`,mobile,email,qq,superior) VALUES (#{username},#{password},#{status},#{name},#{mobile},#{email},#{qq},0) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE password=#{password}, status=#{status}, `name`=#{name}, mobile=#{mobile}, email=#{email}, qq=#{qq}, superior=0, update_time=NOW()
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM shuttle_common.sc_security_staff WHERE id=#{id} AND superior=0
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM shuttle_common.sc_security_staff WHERE id=#{id} AND superior=0
mapper.sql:
FROM shuttle_common.sc_security_staff
AND username=#{username}
AND username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dynamic.username},'%')
AND `name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dynamic.name},'%')
AND mobile LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dynamic.mobile},'%')
AND status=#{status}
AND superior=0
